SuperstitioMod:GangBang.NAME: Gangbang
SuperstitioMod:GangBang.DESCRIPTION: stslib:Autoplay. NL superstitiomod:Desire, ends in %d turns: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain !B! *Semen-Stains.
SuperstitioMod:GangBang.FLAVOR: Let the orgy begin! Everyone, join in!
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: superstitiomod:Desire. NL At the end of turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, gain !B! *Semen-Stains.

SuperstitioMod:GiveBirth.NAME: Delivery
SuperstitioMod:GiveBirth.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! temporary HP. NL Lose all superstitiomod:Pregnancy statuses. NL For each card removed, gain !B! temporary HP.
SuperstitioMod:GiveBirth.FLAVOR: A rebirth of flesh and lust.

SuperstitioMod:SexToy.NAME: Vibrators
SuperstitioMod:SexToy.DESCRIPTION: Equip the target with !M! random superstitiomod:Sex Toys.
SuperstitioMod:SexToy.FLAVOR_SFW: Everyone wants to march under a glorious flag.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION_SFW: Dragon-Phoenix Flag, Flowery Flag, Sun-Moon Flag

SuperstitioMod:SelfReference.NAME: Self-Pleasure
SuperstitioMod:SelfReference.FLAVOR: Screw it, might as well rub one out at this point.
SuperstitioMod:SelfReference.FLAVOR_SFW: Yes, you’ve achieved one of the optional endings of this mod.

SuperstitioMod:FishGirlMode.NAME: Fishgirl Morph
SuperstitioMod:FishGirlMode.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! stacks of superstitiomod:Asphyxiation.

SuperstitioMod:KakaaGirlMode.NAME: Cawcaw Morph
SuperstitioMod:KakaaGirlMode.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! Strength.

SuperstitioMod:SlimeGirlMode.NAME: Slimegirl Morph
SuperstitioMod:SlimeGirlMode.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! superstitiomod:Slime Resilience.

SuperstitioMod:FeelPhantomBody.NAME: Feel Phantom Limb
SuperstitioMod:FeelPhantomBody.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card and a random enemy loses !M! HP. NL If still in hand at end of turn, Exhaust this and return the original card to your discard pile.
SuperstitioMod:FeelPhantomBody.FLAVOR: Take it all... Strip me down... Turn me into a stump... Helpless and yours...

SuperstitioMod:NullCard.NAME: Null Card
SuperstitioMod:NullCard.DESCRIPTION: Upon use, deal 114514 damage to all enemies. NL *Seeing *this card *means *your *reward pool *lacks *sufficient *cards.

MAKE_KEYWORDS.DESCRIPTION: Apparently, you need at least one attack and one skill card of every rarity, as well as power cards of uncommon and rare rarities. Total number should also exceed 20.
The game didn’t crash due to your error only because the author was merciful. But that doesn’t mean you should keep playing like this—defeat is part of war. Try again, hero.
